snippet: The team owner Jeffrey Vanderbeek’s differences with Newark and with two minority owners are reminiscent of issues a former owner, John J. McMullen, had in 1995.
abstract: Richard Sandomir Sports Business column observes that the New Jersey Devils controlling owner Jeffrey Vanderbeek’s differences with Newark and with two minority owners are reminiscent of issues former owner John J McMullen had in 1995.
lead_paragraph: The team owner Jeffrey Vanderbeek’s differences with Newark and with two minority owners are reminiscent of issues a former owner, John J. McMullen, had in 1995.

headline.seo: Stanley Cup Finals — Devils’ Thorny Financial History Repeats
headline.main: Devils’ History of Success and Financial Disputes Repeats
